ss.qwirkle.network

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ss.qwirkle.network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Thread
    Client class for communicating with a remote server.
    Author:
    Dylan
